x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.clusterVersion) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.clusterVersion))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.componentVersion) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.componentVersion))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.gateway) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.gateway))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.location) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.location))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.roles) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.roles))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.tier) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.tier))
